item.title: Nikolas Pattakos' personal e-corner
item.description: Welcome! Link to heading One more developer’s personal webpage / blog. Yes, I know, they are a dime a dozen :) . It serves mostly for my own note taking/documentation. It would be nice if some of its content was also useful to some people. Any comment is appreciated and welcomed, please feel free to contact me. CV Link to heading Work experience Link to heading I work as a software engineer for Thermo Fisher Scientific on a C++/Qt desktop application.
